article_title: Mark Bennett: Trump has his good guys, bad guys, but voters have final say

article_metadata.author: Mark Bennett | Tribune-Star

og.description: Once the Donald Trump show concluded Sunday afternoon inside the Indiana Theatre in downtown Terre Haute, the good guys and the bad guys had been clearly identified.
